StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to add to the include path; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (-I[path])

BoolProperty.Name: NoStandardIncludePaths
BoolProperty.Description: Do not search the standard system directories for system header files. Only the include directories specified using -I will be searched. (-nostdinc)

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more preprocessor defines; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (-D[name[=value]])

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedIncludeFiles
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more forced include files. (-include [path])

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateDebugInformation
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if the compiler will generate debugging information. You must also change linker settings appropriately to match. (-g)

BoolProperty.Name: InlinedScopes
BoolProperty.Description: Select whether to generate debug information for inlined functions. Debug information with optimized code is improved, but executable size and compile time are increased. (-gno-inlined-scopes)

EnumProperty.Name: Warnings
EnumProperty.Description: Selects the extent of warnings issued during compilation; errors are always displayed. (-Wall, -w)

BoolProperty.Name: ExtraWarnings
BoolProperty.Description: Generate extra warnings for certain events not included when using the -Wall switch. (-Wextra)

StringListProperty.Name: EnableSpecificWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify the names of specific warnings to enable; put the names of the warnings in a semi-colon delimited list. (-W[warning])

StringListProperty.Name: DisableSpecificWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify the names of specific warnings to disable; put the names of the warnings in a semi-colon delimited list. (-Wno-[warning])

StringListProperty.Name: ErrorOnSpecificWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify the names of specific warnings to be promoted to errors; put the names of the warnings in a semi-colon delimited list. (-Werror=[warning])

BoolProperty.Name: WarningsAsErrors
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the compiler to treat warnings as errors. (-Werror)

BoolProperty.Name: EnableFixits
BoolProperty.Description: Allow the compiler to provide hints for possible fixes for warning and error diagnostic messages. (-fdiagnostics-parseable-fixits)

BoolProperty.Name: ExtendedDiagnostics
BoolProperty.Description: Display the line of source code related to each error or warning message. In addition, a caret (^) character points to the position of the problem in the line of source code. (-fcaret-diagnostics)

EnumProperty.Name: CompileAs
EnumProperty.Description: Select compile language option for .c and .cpp files. (-x [language])

EnumValue.Name: Default
EnumValue.Description: Default for the file extension used.

StringProperty.Name: ObjectFileName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a name to override the default object file name; can be file or directory name. (-o [file path])

BoolProperty.Name: MultiProcessorCompilation
BoolProperty.Description: Enables multiple source files to be compiled in parallel limited by the value specified in "Max Compilations".

IntProperty.Name: ProcessorNumber
IntProperty.Description: Specifies the maximum number of concurrent compiles to use for this project. If no value is given, the global VC++ setting for "Maximum concurrent C++ compilations" is used.

BoolProperty.Name: Distributable
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if distributed compilation is allowed during a distributed build. Source files will always be compiled locally if disallowed.

BoolProperty.Name: FastMath
BoolProperty.Description: Turns on a number of switches that may speed up floating point math. Uses possibly unsafe assumptions for arguments and results, and may violate IEEE or ANSI standards. (-ffast-math)

BoolProperty.Name: NoStrictAliasing
BoolProperty.Description: Do not use the strictest aliasing rules. Assume objects of different types may reside at the same address. Trades code performance for safety. (-fno-strict-aliasing)

BoolProperty.Name: UnrollLoops
BoolProperty.Description: Unroll loops whose iterations can be determined at compile time, or upon loop entry. Trades code size for potentially faster code. (-funroll-loops, -fno-unroll-loops)

BoolProperty.Name: LinkTimeOptimization
BoolProperty.Description: Delay analysis and optimization until link time. This allows optimizations to be performed across multiple compilation units. May significantly increase link time. Not compatible with Edit and Continue. (-flto)

BoolProperty.Name: CppExceptions
BoolProperty.Description: Enable Exception handling in C++ code. (-fexceptions)

BoolProperty.Name: RuntimeTypeInfo
BoolProperty.Description: Adds code for checking C++ object types at run time (runtime type information). Automatically enabled with Exceptions usage. (-frtti, -fno-rtti)

EnumProperty.Name: CppLanguageStd
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the language standard to use for C++ source. (-std=c++14,-std=c++17)

EnumProperty.Name: CLanguageStd
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the language standard to use for C source. (-std=c89,gnu89,c99,gnu99,c11,gnu11)

BoolProperty.Name: AnsiCompliance
BoolProperty.Description: Check C/C++ code for ANSI compliance. (-ansi)

BoolProperty.Name: CharUnsigned
BoolProperty.Description: Sets whether the unqualified char type is treated as signed or unsigned. (-funsigned-char)

BoolProperty.Name: MsExtensions
BoolProperty.Description: Enables some non-standard MS VC++ extensions. Some cases of unnamed fields in structures and unions are only accepted with this option. (-fms-extensions)

EnumProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeader
EnumProperty.Description: Create/Use Precompiled Header : Enables creation or use of a precompiled header during the build. No object file will be generated when creating a PCH file. (-x c++-header, -include-pch)

StringProperty.Name: PrecompiledHeaderOutputFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path and/or name of the generated precompiled header file.

BoolProperty.Name: AddressSanitizer
BoolProperty.Description: Address Sanitizer

BoolProperty.Name: EnableCodeCoverage
BoolProperty.Description: Enables instrumented generation of code coverage data at runtime. Instrumented code will have a performance penalty. (-fcoverage-mapping -fprofile-instr-generate=[file])

StringProperty.Name: CodeCoverageOutputFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the target side file path to where raw profile data will be written when Code Coverage has been enabled.

StringListProperty.Name: AnalyzerCheckers
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the checker packages, or individual checkers to use during static analysis; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (-analyzer-checker=checker)

StringListProperty.Name: DisableCheckers
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more individual checkers to disable from those currently enabled; use semi-colon delimited list if more than one. (-analyzer-disable-checker=checker)

EnumProperty.Name: AnalysisLevel
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the level for static analysis. Deeper levels perform more exhaustive searching to find potential defects.

BoolProperty.Name: Analyze
BoolProperty.Description: Specify if static analysis is allowed. Static analysis can be disabled for individual source files, or whole projects.

StringProperty.Name: AdditionalOptions
StringProperty.Description: Specify additional compiler command line options not provided by the other properties. The options format must be valid.
